20110122023413.000|20110122023415.000|CC1|TO OVERCOME A VERY SERIOUS      
20110122023415.000|20110122023417.000|CC1|WOUND.                          
20110122023417.000|20110122023418.000|CC1|THE BULLET PENETRATED THE LEFT  
20110122023418.000|20110122023419.000|CC1|HEMISPHERE OF HER BRAIN-- THE   
20110122023419.000|20110122023421.000|CC1|AREA CONTROLLING VISION, SPEECH,
20110122023421.000|20110122023422.000|CC1|INFORMATION PROCESSING AND      
20110122023422.000|20110122023424.000|CC1|PERSONALITY.                    
20110122023424.000|20110122023425.000|CC1|BUT NEUROLOGISTS ARE LEARNING   
20110122023425.000|20110122023426.000|CC1|THAT DAMAGED PARTS OF THE BRAIN 
20110122023426.000|20110122023427.000|CC1|CAN ACTUALLY BORROW FUNCTION    
20110122023427.000|20110122023429.000|CC1|FROM HEALTHY AREAS.             
20110122023429.000|20110122023429.000|CC1|>> THE BRAIN CLEARLY DOES REWIRE
20110122023429.000|20110122023432.000|CC1|ITSELF.                         
20110122023432.000|20110122023435.000|CC1|IT HAS WHAT'S CALLED PLASTICITY.
20110122023435.000|20110122023435.000|CC1|SO IT'S ABLE TO RESPOND IN      
20110122023435.000|20110122023437.000|CC1|DIFFERENT WAYS.                 
20110122023437.000|20110122023438.000|CC1|AND CLEARLY PEOPLE WITH SEVERE  
20110122023438.000|20110122023439.000|CC1|BRAIN INJURIES CAN RELEARN HOW  
20110122023439.000|20110122023442.000|CC1|TO FUNCTION, SPEAK, MOVE TO A   
20110122023442.000|20110122023445.000|CC1|CERTAIN DEGREE.                 
20110122023445.000|20110122023447.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FIRST DOCTORS WILL 
20110122023447.000|20110122023448.000|CC1|THOROUGHLY EVALUATE GIFFORDS,   
20110122023448.000|20110122023449.000|CC1|THEN DESIGN A PLAN THAT CAN     
20110122023449.000|20110122023450.000|CC1|INCLUDE THERAPY FOR SPEECH,     
20110122023450.000|20110122023451.000|CC1|WALKING AND THE BASIC FUNCTIONS 
20110122023451.000|20110122023453.000|CC1|OF DAILY LIFE.                  
20110122023453.000|20110122023454.000|CC1|IT MIGHT EVEN INCLUDE GROUND-   
20110122023454.000|20110122023457.000|CC1|BREAKING VIRTUAL REALITY SYSTEMS
20110122023457.000|20110122023458.000|CC1|THAT ALLOW PATIENTS TO PRACTICE 
20110122023458.000|20110122023459.000|CC1|LIVING IN A SAFE, SIMULATED     
20110122023459.000|20110122023500.000|CC1|ENVIRONMENT.

20110122023524.000|20110122023525.000|CC1|>> REHAB?                       
20110122023525.000|20110122023525.000|CC1|IT'S HARD.                      
20110122023525.000|20110122023528.000|CC1|I'M NOT GOING TO LIE TO YOU.    
20110122023528.000|20110122023529.000|CC1|THERE'S SOME DAYS I GET         
20110122023529.000|20110122023530.000|CC1|FRUSTRATED.                     
20110122023530.000|20110122023532.000|CC1|>> Reporter: 29-YEAR-OLD KENNY  
20110122023532.000|20110122023534.000|CC1|ADAMS WAS BLINDED AFTER BEING   
20110122023534.000|20110122023535.000|CC1|SHOT THROUGH THE HEAD IN
